EmailTemplate.description: VILT Welcome email for the Europe English IPH Programme
EmailTemplate.name: IPH Welcome Europe Open Enrollment VILT English
EmailTemplate.subject: Improve Project Health | Prework and Programme Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We look forward to your participation in {!Training_Event}
Programme Dates: {!Training_Event__c.Start_Date__c} - {!Training_Event__c.End_Date__c} at {!Training_Event__c.Location__c}
Our goal is to equip you with advanced skills to improve your project results
PREPARING FOR YOUR programme Prework Requirements
To maximize your in-programme learning experience, you will need to complete a number of prework tasks. You should allow 30 minutes to complete.
Pre-work tasks and Pre-Learning
To prepare for the programme you will receive an email from portal@prosci.com with a notification that the tools have been added to your account. Please log into your Portal to complete the tasks below.
Access the Applying the PCT Model Knowledge Hub and download or print the programme workbook to support your in-programme learning experience. To refresh your knowledge of the PCT Model, view the following five microlearning videos located in the PCT Model Overview section of the Applying the PCT Model Knowledge Hub:
What is the PCT Model? Why use the PCT Model? How do you assess project health with the PCT Model? Who completes the PCT Assessment? When should you complete a PCT Assessment?
If you obtained your Prosci Certification prior to April 2021, please also read this document to learn how the PCT Model has evolved since it was first introduced in 2006.
Schedule
The schedule below indicates the time you will be required to be live online.
Course Timings prompt start at local time zone: Europe/London
{!Training_Event__c.Program_Schedule__c}
To add this to your Outlook Calendar, please click on the attachment.
Your Instructor will factor in breaks in around the flow of training.
What You Need for Success as a Virtual Learner
Your learning experience is very important to us. In the virtual environment, the following will greatly enhance your experience and success:
Uninterrupted time to focus. Laptop or desktop computer with Microsoft Office 2007 or newer. Mac users, please use Microsoft Office for Mac to ensure tool compatibility High-speed internet connection Webcam capable of streaming you by video Audio headset or audio connection with speaker and microphone
You will receive an email a few days before your programme that will include specific information on how to access your session via your virtual meeting link/ID
Our delivery team will be online 15 minutes before the start of class each day. We ask that you join early to confirm that your technology is working.
If you have any questions about preparing for your programme, please don’t hesitate to contact us at training.europe@prosci.com
Best regards,
{!Training_Event__c.OwnerFullName}
Training Coordinator
CONNECT WITH US:
Prosci Europe SRL (comprising the former Prosci affiliates CMC Partnership and Nexum) is the new European division of Prosci, operating in Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, the UK and Switzerland. See https://www.proscieurope.com/prosci-europe for the list of registered offices.

Please note that the views of the author may not necessarily reflect those of Prosci Europe SRL.
